alert.note: Alert for Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 02 at 4:54PM EST until December 02 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Duval County in northeastern Florida... * Until 530 PM EST. * At 454 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Normandy, or 9 miles southwest of Jacksonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Cecil Field, Nas Jax, Normandy, Ortega, and Jacksonville Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
